<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Deceiver's Cloak](/Spells.aspx?ID=795)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Hex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=324" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=323" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 238 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Lesson**
[Lesson of Mischief](/Lessons.aspx?ID=6)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained
</row>

</column>

---

You wrap yourself in a cloak of illusion, appearing as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself. This has the effects of a 3rd-level [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159).

---
**Heightened (6th)** You can appear as any creature of the same size, even with a completely different body shape.
name: Deceiver's Cloak
